securityRuleType.description: The requested access type. For example: read-only or read/write.
securityRuleType.name: Device Access Type

securityRuleType.description: The mounting point for the device if keys are approved. For example: /mnt/secure or X.
securityRuleType.name: Device Mount Point

securityRuleType.description: Date and time the keyrequest was received.
securityRuleType.name: Key Request Date

securityRuleType.description: The IP Address that requested the keys.
securityRuleType.name: Request Source IP Address

securityRuleType.description: The IPv6 Address that requested the keys.
securityRuleType.name: Request Source IPv6 Address

securityRuleType.description: Date and time the instance was first seen by the system.
securityRuleType.name: Instance First Seen

securityRuleType.description: The data packet provided to the instance at start up. For example DataKey=MySecretKey.
securityRuleType.name: Instance User Data

securityRuleType.description: The location of the Server farm running the machine instance. For example us-east-1c.
securityRuleType.name: Instance Location

securityRuleType.description: The version of the ossec-init.conf security file. For example 2.2 or 2.3.
securityRuleType.name: OSSEC Version

securityRuleType.description: Trend Micro Softwares. For example DeepSecurity
securityRuleType.name: Trend Micro softwares

securityRuleType.description: Trend Micro scan engine version.
securityRuleType.name: Trend Micro Virus Scan Engine

securityRuleType.description: Trend Micro virus scan conventional pattern version.
securityRuleType.name: Trend Micro Virus Scan Pattern

securityRuleType.description: The guest OS type. For example Windows.
securityRuleType.name: Guest OS Type

securityRuleType.description: The guest OS architecture. For example 32 bits.
securityRuleType.name: Guest OS Architecture

securityRuleType.description: The network services.
securityRuleType.name: Network Services

securityRuleType.description: Deep Security Status
securityRuleType.name: Deep Security Status

securityRuleType.description: Deep Security Anti-Malware Status
securityRuleType.name: Deep Security Anti-Malware Status

securityRuleType.description: Deep Security Web Reputation Status
securityRuleType.name: Deep Security Web Reputation Status

securityRuleType.description: Deep Security Firewall Status
securityRuleType.name: Deep Security Firewall Status

securityRuleType.description: Deep Security DPI Status
securityRuleType.name: Deep Security DPI Status

securityRuleType.description: Deep Security Integrity Monitoring Status
securityRuleType.name: Deep Security Integrity Monitoring Status

securityRuleType.description: Deep Security Log Inspection Status
securityRuleType.name: Deep Security Log Inspection Status
